member.name: IEnumResources.Clone
member.param: Contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IEnumResources.Next
member.param: The number of resources requested. Currently, must be 1.
Receives a pointer to a structure.
A pointer to the number of resources retrieved. Currently, not used.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IEnumResources.Reset
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IEnumResources.Skip
member.summary: Skips a specified number of resources.
member.param: The number of resources to skip.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
